relation: You can do anything for fun. There's a gym to play basketball, workout, swim or even play tennis. You can play any inter-mural game in the plaza area because there is so much room for everyone. You are limited by you imagination.

the food is great, theres always different things to choose from everyday. You will never feel like your eating the same thing everyday. Theres multiple pizza places, a truck called burger box who makes the juicest burgers in newark. There is a variety of food at Rutgers Newark.
There is something to do every day, or night. Either if its a party or a school event or even a sports game, Rutgers Newark always has something happen. Its never a dead campus.

You get a decent amount of homework, but the professors are very understanding and give you time to complete them. You learn every day and there are people standing by to help you if you feel overwhelmed.

This college should definitely be number one on your list, the night life is great. You are a 5 min away from penn station that can take you to New York. The people here are friendly and everyone gets along like a family.
Rutgers Newark is a great college. There is so much to do after school, and its very diverse. I ma having a great time at Rutgers Newark
pageTitle: Rutgers University-Newark Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {222865=Dinning halls are okay. There's always something to eat. I wouldn't say that there are many choices though. The kitchen staff is so nice. The downside of the dinning halls in RU Newark is its timing. Breakfast: 7:30-10:30 Lunch: 11:30-1:30 dinner: 5-8 late night: 9-12 (Not available every day in the week and start 2 weeks after school), 110719=I recently joined an African dance team in September. I'm not much of a sports person so dancing is what I enjoy doing most. I also enjoy reading its doesn't sound so much fun but it helps kill time., 75782=I have yet to taste the food, I will be attending in the fall of 2012., 252705=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: What to do for fun socialize at the student lounge relax at the golden dome intramural sports path train to ny Food and Dining yummy Dorm Life commuter Tips for prospective students be in class on time. get involved in campus activities. utilize all the resources in the school because you are paying for it. In three sentences rutgers newark located in the inner city. small size school. the school has great professors to work with Login to rate or flag the reviews Roisin from Boynton Beach, FL 01/11/2011 Reviewer is Accepted here and planning to attend soon.
